name: Tropical Rush
description:
Tropical Rush is my very first game I've made! I had a lot of fun making it, and wanted to share to see what others thought of it!

Tropical Rush is a game where you click, and match the top image to grow your score. The image changes, and time ticks down. Successfully match to gain more time and continue your run. Different game modes like Easy & Hard to challenge yourself and test your pattern matching skills. Improve reaction time by racing against the clock!
